attributes.review: this app took two weeks to download, when it finally did my TV started playing Fox News with the same stories on loop. my Alexa started talking about China. I couldn't get anything to turn off. when I opened it my Google account notified me someone was trying to access it. I don't understand what's happening, my grandmother called saying someone tried to hack her Facebook.
attributes.title: Absolutely DiSgUsTiN

attributes.review: I just don’t understand how an app can take 5 days to download, and my phone had to be suspended from a hot air balloon driven by dolphins the entire time. When I was finally able to open the app it attempted to attack me by shooting a sparkly knife out of my phone. Luckily it was pointing towards one of the dolphins instead. I was during the developers but my lawyer turned into emily from SM6 Band and did the Debby ryan face. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS
attributes.title: Terrible ✨🧚

attributes.review: I’ve been waiting to write this review for a week, since that’s how long it took to download. I’m extremely disappointed in our president and his tech team. Why can’t a humble girl just download an app to support her president that she previously adored? Is that so much to ask? I’m completely heartbroken. I don’t think I will ever view president Trump the same again. Thank you for ruining my life with this poopy trash.
attributes.title: poopy ‼️‼️‼️

attributes.review: I was just trying to check the news but I can’t because this app gets in the way and is just another reminder that our government system is broken and this country is falling apart if we can’t even stand together. As soon as I downloaded it, my whole phone blacked out?!?!?!?! I paid for this phone myself as a colored woman in the US. Now I need to go buy a new phone. Thanks government
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I really wish I could rate this at 0 stars bc I would 🥴 I tried to download this app but it took so long and when it finally did download it asked for my phone number 🤭 I dont want donald texting me!!!!! after this I tired to find some helpful information but it seems to just be full of ignorant, racist, homophobic content etc!!!! 0/10 helpful and 0/10 appropriate
attributes.title: absolutely horrible

attributes.review: So I get on the app and I can’t login because the app says use my phone number I use it and it does not work this app it bad it acts slow it just to slow for meh 😒 😌I hope this app gets taken down because that is not good that he had this app and it acts slow by the way nobody like u Donald Duck 🦆😂😂 that’s all I don’t even know why I put a star but I had to put one star to make this review for this Donald Duck 🦆 bye 🤧 DONT BAND TIKTOK 😌

So when i first downloaded the app every thing was going fine but then out of ✨nowhere✨ I look at my phone and there’s some racist orange dude talking about how he wanted us to vote for him in the 2020 election?!?As if I’d vote for that CLOWN 🤡😽💅💅💅 I mean the guy claimed that he wanted to slow down testings of the virus 🦠 like what idiot would vote for him 🥱😘🤚only the boomers r dumb enough to do that 😌 anywayyyyys if i could give this app a no star review then TRUST ME i would PERIOD.
attributes.title: VERY SCARY 🥴✨😣

attributes.review: I WISH I could give this app 0 stars...it took forever to download on my phone, and now once I click on it, it takes over 20 minutes to load👎🏼👎🏼all of the features the app description said the app has are not available and do not work on my iPhone XS Max🤢🤮I would highly deter everyone from downloading this app, for it has only made my life more complicated and stressful.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: The moment I downloaded this app my fishbowl rolled off my table and shattered onto the floor, killing my fish😡 this app is cursed!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT if you don’t want to have your fish slaughtered by a loud orange man!!! And if that wasn’t bad enough, the orange man was telling racist and sexist things at my elephant that lives in my attic! A very rude thing to do. It’s an elephant! Meaning my whole house collapsed! This app is the worst it should not even exist. How dare it ruin my life like this!
attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE

attributes.review: It took forever to download and bricked my phone basically. Destroyed my storage space and occupied all the CPU. When it would open, there would be illegal acts displayed in the app. Extremely vile content. Nasty. Truly not a god fearing app. IT WOULD THEN ASK FOR ALL OF YOUR MONEY AND PASSWORDS. A total scam. Insane amount of illicit activity. Afterwards the app would constantly crash until I had to factory reset my phone. Do NOT GET UNLESS YOU WANT TO HAVE TO BUY A NEW PHONE.
attributes.title: Destroyed my phone
